key_findings: Tashkent: High traffic pollution (NO2) detected in 2019
Tashkent: High photochemical pollution risk (O3) in 2019
Tashkent: High industrial pollution (SO2) detected in 2019
Tashkent: High traffic pollution (NO2) detected in 2020
Tashkent: High photochemical pollution risk (O3) in 2020
Tashkent: High industrial pollution (SO2) detected in 2020
Tashkent: Increasing trend in CO levels over time
Tashkent: Increasing trend in CH4 levels over time
Tashkent: Increasing trend in SO2 levels over time
recommendations: Continue Sentinel-based air quality monitoring for long-term trends
Implement traffic emission controls and promote public transportation
Develop strategies to reduce VOC emissions and photochemical smog formation
Strengthen industrial emission regulations and monitoring
